comments.body: Quote from: LucyMairinger44 on June 23, 2023, 02:33:38 AM1076 - TikTok Live Stream Views [ 15 Minutes ] Max 100KBuy TikTok live stream views to put up a front on TiktokLink: https://smmpaneles.com/servicesI’m skeptical on this kind of services especially the name of the website. I’ve got scammed by same service that name smmpanels before. They have a working SMM service at the start but later on they turn into scam trapping my balance inside since all their product is unusable. Most of their boost feeds is fake and will just harm your social media account especially tiktok that shadow banned user which involved on spam or services like this.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: LucyMairinger44 on June 23, 2023, 02:33:38 AM1076 - TikTok Live Stream Views [ 15 Minutes ] Max 100KBuy TikTok live stream views to put up a front on TiktokLink: https://smmpaneles.com/servicesPlease avoid using this service, they are scammers. If @OP wants to provide such services, he must use BTT escrow[1] due to the high risks related to such a service and the lack of a commercial record for him or Go first.Generally, you can find some people who sell these products, so the price and the quality of the accounts are the most important.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5427825.0

comments.author: LucyMairinger44
comments.body: Nah, We do not provide scam services. We also know that there are many scammers on the online platform. For whom our name is bad. We can do whatever you ask for your trust

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: LucyMairinger44 on June 24, 2023, 12:38:45 PMNah, We do not provide scam services. We also know that there are many scammers on the online platform. For whom our name is bad. We can do whatever you ask for your trust  The best way to gain a little bit of the trust is by offering your service for free to some reputed members. If your service turns out to be legit then those members can vouch for you, and you may get some sales in future. Another way to gain the trust of the members is to make a reputed member such as @GazetaBitcoin the escrow for the service. In 2nd scenario the escrow will hold the money of the users who are interested in getting your services, and once you deliver your service then the escrow will release that money to you.
